hero.title: Full-Stack Digital Solutions Expert
hero.description: I develop digital solutions that transform ideas into tangible results. With experience in government and educational projects, I deliver high-performance applications that create real value for your users.

fulltime.question: Are you available for full-time positions?
fulltime.answer: Yes, I'm seeking full-time opportunities to apply my full-stack development expertise. I have a strong interest in contributing to scalable projects and joining a results-driven team.

pricing.question: How does your pricing and scheduling process work?
pricing.answer: Investment is customized based on project complexity and timeline. We can schedule a meeting to discuss details and find the best solution for your needs.

tech.question: What are your core technical specialties?
tech.answer: I specialize in modern web development with React.js, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js. I have solid experience in both frontend and backend development, including PHP/Yii, MySQL, and cloud services.

project.question: What is your work methodology?
project.answer: I begin with a detailed analysis of business requirements and objectives. My approach prioritizes clean, maintainable code, focusing on performance and user experience.

tools.question: What is your experience with management tools?
tools.answer: I'm proficient in Jira, Git, and other collaborative tools. I have experience in technical leadership, presentations, and developer mentoring, ensuring consistent deliveries and knowledge sharing.

contact.title: Let's Start a Project
contact.description: Ready to transform your idea into reality? Let's discuss how I can help achieve your business objectives.

feedback.roberto: After working together for almost three years, I can confidently say that Yan is one of the best developers Iâ€™ve ever known. His ability to analyze, understand, and solve complex problems is truly remarkable. Yan is a true team player who is always willing to lend a helping hand, share knowledge, and grow alongside his team. His approachable demeanor and dedication to teamwork foster a positive and highly productive work environment for everyone around him. I would be thrilled to have the opportunity to work with Yan again in the future.
feedback.cadu: I had the pleasure of working alongside Yan for two years, and it was an incredible experience. He always stood out as both a developer and instructor, sharing his knowledge and helping the team overcome challenges and achieve excellent results. His experience was fundamental to my technical and professional growth. Additionally, Yan always contributed to projects with innovative ideas that made a difference in the work's progress and quality. An exemplary and inspiring professional!
feedback.arthur: During our time working together, Yan elevated the project's standards in terms of code structure and organization. His skills with data structures and algorithms significantly contributed to improving team performance. I recommend him for his technical capability and strategic participation in any project.
